translation.en: - Did you? - Yes.

translation.en: I have to get back to work. Kitchen's next.

translation.en: Stop. You're not gonna have anything left.

translation.en: That's okay. What I do have will bring me joy.

translation.en: Mom...

translation.en: When some time passes and you realize you've given away all of your stuff,

translation.en: I don't know what to do or where to go.

translation.en: I was married for 50 years.

translation.en: Ah, you don't understand.

translation.en: - I understand. - You can't understand. You're not married.
translation.vi: - Con hiểu mà. - Con không thể. Con chưa kết hôn.

translation.en: - Luke and I are as good as married. - No, you're roommates.
translation.vi: - Con và Luke cũng như kết hôn rồi. - Chỉ là bạn cùng phòng.

translation.en: Someday you'll go off and find another roommate.

translation.en: I had a real partner for 50 years and now I'm alone.

translation.en: - Oh, God, no. - Why not?

translation.en: All those women with red noses and Skechers.

translation.en: - All they do is sit around and complain. - What an annoying grief group.

translation.en: When it's my turn, there's no time left to talk about me.

translation.en: - Right. - I have problems. I can't help them.

translation.en: - Who? - Just a person.

translation.en: - What kind of person? - A normal person

translation.en: with an office and a prescription pad.

translation.en: - You mean a psychiatrist. - That could work, too.

translation.en: - You want me to go to therapy. - Till you get back on your feet.

translation.en: I knew it. You have been trying to get me to a therapist ever since you saw that Tony Soprano show.

translation.en: I have not. He did make it look cool though, right?

translation.en: I'm not crazy.

translation.en: No. You're in pain. This is uncharted territory.

translation.en: If it might help, what's the harm?

translation.en: - I'll think about it. - Okay. But really consider it.

translation.en: - I will. - And if you do it, commit.

translation.en: You know, really go for it.

translation.en: - I will. - Jump in with both feet.

translation.en: Five, six days a week. Really Woody Allen the hell out of it.

translation.en: - I got it. - 'Cause he's totally normal now.

translation.en: I promise, Lorelai.

translation.en: Okay, but first, don't you think you want to...

translation.en: Oh, God, yes.

translation.en: - Are you drunk? - I found a therapist.

translation.en: - You're kidding. - Linda in my garden club is bipolar,

translation.en: so I asked if she had someone she could recommend.

translation.en: - Good thinking. - She's a lovely woman.

translation.en: - I could get one for you. - Sure.

translation.en: I go there once a week and we just talk. Talk about anything.

translation.en: - Or nothing if there's nothing on my mind. - Sounds great, Mom.

translation.en: Thank you for suggesting it. I think it's exactly what I needed.
